header.description:
We give our forum by law creating a pre-portal hosting for users with all the information you need. The cookies are proof device and does not require JavaScript so even on older browsers can be displayed throughout. It also provides some additional functions and auto translated into many different languages.
For validate your cookie policy you mast edit the language file for add your personal text to the string for customize the content and validate it (for the European law). The file is here: - root/language/LANG/xir_cookie_mod.php
If you wont enable/disable language can comment the line in this file: - root/includes/xir_cookie_mod/xir_cookie_allowed_lang.php
Tiny Version - Minified code
header.author-notes: This mod not use js but ib build entirely php with the help of css for the animations. The copyright is vital ad add the copyright string to all footer and all style installed or the forum will not work.
